title: Stolen by the Mafia King
description: I didn't know he has been watching me all this time. I had a plan to escape. Everything is going perfectly at my wedding rehearsal dinner until he turns up. The Kingpin. Twenty years older. Dark, dangerous, gorgeous. I was going to get out of this arranged marriage, but he steals me away. I want freedom. He wants me. We make a deal. If I can escape, he'll let me go. If I can't, I'll be his to do with as he likes for twenty-four hours. A thirty second head start and a key. Run . Stolen by the Mafia King is a short and spicy instalove romance, starring an obsessed billionaire and the innocent girl who never dared dream of him.
author: Evie  Rose
